bike.description: D6 high modulus carbon w/ RIB Tech, integrated head tube w/ 1 1/2" lower, integrated aero seat tube, internal cable routing, oversized PIIS BB-86 shell, double water bottle mounts
sizes: S (50cm), S/M (52cm), M (54cm), M/L (56cm), L (58cm), L/XL (60cm)

components.description: D6 high modulus carbon thin seat stays, oversized ETC chainstay, forged alloy dropout w/ replaceable hanger
FC-330 carbon monocoque w/ RIB Tech, tapered carbon steerer & carbon dropout
Rotor Press-Fit BB86/30 sealed cartridge bearing
Shimano Dura Ace STI shifter/brake, 20-speed Flight Deck compatible
Oval 958 carbon/alloy, 58mm rims, straight pull DT Swiss aero spokes 18/24H, sealed bearing hubs
Oval 900 forged alloy dual pivot w/ cartridge pads
Oval 1 1/8"U - 1 1/2"L integrated w/ carbon top cover
Selle Italia SL Kit Carbonio w/ tubular manganese rails
Integrated seat mast w/ Oval carbon topper w/ 2-bolt clamp system
